thread.title: Adidas shares jump on buyback, profit optimism

title: Adidas shares jump on buyback, profit optimism
text:
Adidas shares jump on buyback, profit optimism Wednesday, March 14, 2018 - 01:15 
Shares of German sportswear firm Adidas soar after it announces a large buyback, gives an upbeat outlook for 2018 and lifts its 2020 profitability forecast, helped by rapid growth of ecommerce. Ivor Bennett reports.   
Shares of German sportswear firm Adidas soar after it announces a large buyback, gives an upbeat outlook for 2018 and lifts its 2020 profitability forecast, helped by rapid growth of ecommerce. Ivor Bennett reports.  //reut.rs/2IohUYM
